titles.title: Protecting Our Kids' Medicine Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to ensure accurate, intelligible information on dosage delivery devices packaged with liquid over-the-counter medications.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation
